artist: engraver: Jan Wierix; artist: After Martino Rota; painter: After Michelangelo
description: The Last Judgement; Christ in center surrounded by many figurew with two trumpeters below him; others below being forced from boat into hell; after Michealangelo's fresco in the Sistine Chapel
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription
on sheet  in black: Iohan / Wirings / caelavit /  MICHAEL  ANGELUS BONAROTVS PATRICIUS FLORENT AN AGENS LXXIII  |  on sheet LLC in pencil: 1-31
title: The Last Judgement
